items.question: Is Candle Master really free?
items.answer: Yes! The basic version is 100% free forever. You get 100 moves per game, 10 legendary stocks, and all 3 themes. No credit card, no tricks.

items.question: Why should I practice here instead of paper trading?
items.answer: Paper trading shows you the stock name and current news - you already know what happens. Candle Master uses 'blind trading' where you don't know the stock or time period. This forces you to actually learn chart reading, not just remember what happened to Tesla.

items.question: I'm a complete beginner. Is this for me?
items.answer: Absolutely! We built this because we lost thousands as beginners. The Candle Academy teaches patterns from scratch, and you can practice as much as you want without risking a single dollar.

items.question: What stocks can I practice with?
items.answer: 500+ legendary stocks with data from 1980-2025. You'll experience Tesla crashes, Apple rallies, Bitcoin volatility, and market crashes. Free users get 10 stocks, PRO unlocks everything.

items.question: Can I play on desktop or tablet?
items.answer: Yes! You can play on any device ‚Äî mobile, tablet, or desktop browser. The game works best on mobile, but the tablet and desktop layout gives you a wider chart view. Just open app.candlemaster.app in your browser.

items.question: How do I cancel PRO?
items.answer: Cancel anytime from app settings. No questions, no hassle. Both monthly and yearly plans can be cancelled at any time.

creatorStory.title: Why I Built Candle Master

meta.title: Why I Built Candle Master ‚Äî The Story Behind the Game
meta.description: The Creator shares how Candle Master was born from a personal trading journey ‚Äî from painful losses to building a game that helps traders practice with real historical data.

hero.title: Why I Built
hero.story: This game was born from pure accident. Originally, I just wanted to build a personal tool to practice blind trading for myself. But as I kept adding features, it started getting fun. When I shared it with my trader friends, even more ideas came pouring in ‚Äî and before I knew it, it had turned into the game you see today.

problem.title: The Losses
problem.description: As a trader myself, I know exactly what we all go through when starting out. If you haven't quit the game already, haha ‚Äî you've probably experienced the same things I did.

signals.title: Trusting Signal Groups
signals.description: Following calls from trading groups, trusting gurus blindly. When they're wrong, you lose money ‚Äî and you learn absolutely nothing.

news.title: Trading on News & Emotion
news.description: Making decisions based on headlines, FOMO, revenge trading to win back losses, and overconfidence after a winning streak.

noSkill.title: Poor Money Management
noSkill.description: Using the wrong tools, mismanaging capital, and jumping into live markets without proper skills. Even paper trading didn't save us from real-market pain.

realization.title: The
realization.description: We've all been taught that "History Always Repeats Itself." We've studied hard, and we've bled in the markets. But with experience, you come to understand ‚Äî it's not just about knowledge. It's about everything combined: psychology, experience, risk management, and trading method.
realization.quote: No matter how fancy your tools are, at the end of the day, it all comes down to price going up or down. Real Historical Data is the ultimate test of whether you can read the market right.

solution.title: So I Built
solution.description: Candle Master runs on simple logic that actually works. You control the pace ‚Äî skip ahead anytime to see the result of your decisions. The game is built around real market data from 1980 to 2025.

historical.title: Why Less is More?
historical.description: Why so few tools? Because you need to prove that simple tools are enough to survive. Just Volume and MA. If you can do it with these, why clutter your decisions with a million indicators? Keep it simple.

blind.title: Why End-of-Day?
blind.description: Whether you trade manually or via automation, you need a framework. EOD means collecting the full day's data and making decisions on complete candles. Imagine managing 10+ assets without clear execution rules ‚Äî chaos. This is the foundation for building automation later.

riskFree.title: Think Trading Was Easier Back Then?
riskFree.description: Some say "trading was easier before HFT." Have you actually tried it? Life during those times wasn't easy at all. This game lets you taste the bitterness of the Dot-Com crash firsthand, haha.

philosophy.title: The
philosophy.usp1: Candle Master wasn't built by a master.
philosophy.usp2: It was built by a fellow dreamer ‚Äî just like you.

skills.title: Not a Master, Just a Player
skills.description: The creator is just another trader who dreamed of becoming a master. The road to consistent profits and trading for a living wasn't easy. For some it might be ‚Äî but I'm one of the many who needed a lot of time to build this skill.

practice.title: Simple Logic, Real Results
practice.description: Candle Master is built on logic that's simple and actually works. No gimmicks, no shortcuts. Just you, the chart, and your decisions.

fun.title: From Indie Trader to Indie Dev
fun.description: What started as a personal training tool became a passion project. I never planned to become a developer ‚Äî but here we are, and I wouldn't change a thing.

closer.title: Thank You
closer.description: Seriously, thank you to everyone who supports this indie trader's dream project. I guess I'm an indie dev now too, haha. Candle Master is built with love, from a trader who's been through it all ‚Äî for traders who are just getting started.
